# Copilot Instructions

This repository contains organization-wide GitHub configurations and templates for the marmoos-project organization.

## General Guidelines

- Follow GitHub's best practices for organization-level configuration
- Maintain consistency across all workflow files and templates
- Keep configurations modular and reusable
- Document any changes to shared workflows or templates

## Code Style

- Use clear, descriptive names for workflows and actions
- Add comments to explain complex workflow logic
- Follow YAML formatting conventions with consistent indentation (2 spaces)
- Use meaningful commit messages following conventional commits format

## Testing

- Test workflow changes in a fork or test repository before applying to organization
- Validate YAML syntax before committing
- Consider the impact on all repositories using shared configurations

## Documentation

- Update documentation when adding or modifying workflows
- Include usage examples for reusable workflows
- Document any required secrets or environment variables
